fallbackQuotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
fallbackQuotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

fallbackQuotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
fallbackQuotes.author: Winston Churchill

fallbackQuotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
fallbackQuotes.author: Steve Jobs

fallbackQuotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
fallbackQuotes.author: Sam Levenson

fallbackQuotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

fallbackQuotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
fallbackQuotes.author: Confucius

fallbackQuotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
fallbackQuotes.author: George Addair

fallbackQuotes.text: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.
fallbackQuotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

fallbackQuotes.text: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it.
fallbackQuotes.author: Nelson Mandela

fallbackQuotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.

fallbackQuotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
fallbackQuotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

fallbackQuotes.text: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
fallbackQuotes.author: C.S. Lewis

fallbackQuotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.

fallbackQuotes.text: Great things never come from comfort zones.
fallbackQuotes.author: Unknown
